body:
Hi Rob,


Nice to see you too! 


I got the precompiled binaries, worked fine. The thing is, i see the 'helmet.fnt' sitting right here in the lib-folder RAYPATH points to- it's just that falsecolor does not see it the way i do :)


Aksel
